sentences.en: All the locations are within a half - mile, plus or minus three - tenths.
sentences.cn: 所有的地点在半英里之内, 加减30%.

sentences.en: But recently executions in Singapore have fallen by nine - tenths .
sentences.cn: 然而,最近新加坡的死刑处决率下跌了 十分之九.

sentences.en: Cheerfulness and diligence are nine - tenths of practical wisdom.
sentences.cn: 愉快和勤奋就是绝大部分的实用知识.

sentences.en: For testing purposes, try to create an even, easily repeatable timing pattern, such as two-tenths of a second between each key release.
sentences.cn: 出于测试目的，尝试创建一个均匀、容易重复的计时模式，例如在每次键释放之间间隔十分之二秒。

sentences.en: I read nine - tenths of the book so far.
sentences.cn: 现在我已经快读完这本书了.

sentences.en: It was one hundred and two and four tenths.
sentences.cn: 其实是一百零二度四分.

sentences.en: Jenson Button's best times fell a couple of tenths shy.
sentences.cn: 巴顿的最佳时期下降了零点几秒害羞.

sentences.en: Nine - tenths of wisdom is being wise in time.
sentences.cn: 聪明的百分之九十在于明智的及时.

sentences.en: Nine tenths of education is encouragement.
sentences.cn: 教育的十分之九在于鼓励.

sentences.en: Possession is nine - tenths of the law.
Schumacher lost four tenths on lap 19.
sentences.cn: 第十九圈舒马赫丢掉了0.4秒.

sentences.en: The creature is more than twice the length and three times the diameter--four tenths of an inch (10 millimeters)--of the next largest known related mollusk.
sentences.cn: 与同类中第二大的动物相比，该新种的长度是其两倍多，直径——十分之四英寸（10毫米）——是其三倍多。

sentences.en: The first twofigures after the decimal point indicate tenths and hundredthsrespectively.
sentences.cn: 小数点后的头两位数分别表示十分位和百分位.

sentences.en: The spring had been unusually dry and we received only two tenths of an inch of rain during the entire month of June.
sentences.cn: 春天异常干旱，我们在整个6月只有0.2英寸的降雨量。

sentences.en: There was ten tenths cloud at that time.
This approach shaved a few tenths of a second off the normal running time, and a few seconds off the large-input version.
sentences.cn: 这种方法将正常的运行时间削减了十分之几秒，在较大的输入版本的情况下削减了数秒钟。

sentences.en: Three - tenths of water is disappeared.
sentences.cn: 十分之三 的水不见了.

sentences.en: We received only two tenths of an inch of rain during the entire month of June.
sentences.cn: 整个6月，我们这里的降水量只有0.2英寸。

trans.tran_cn: 第十（个）( tenth的名词复数 )，十分之一，第十的，第十个的，十分之一的
